TextEng: Goodbye.
You always talk like that?
Are you always this forward?
Me ask questions, yuh?
Could I ask you some questions?
Dese farmlands stretch on for long time. Me need directions.
Text: 이 농장 땅 엄청 넓어. 나 길 알려줘.

TextEng: Who you calling idiot?
That better. Now you tell me how get places.
Text: 이게 낫네. 이제 길 어떻게 가는지 말해줘.

TextEng: You know odd things about dis area?
Me hear of stuff going on. Maybe you know more?
Text: 나 무슨 일 있다고 들었어. 너 더 알아?

TextEng: Can I ask you some directions?
No, me have other question.
Me need place to buy stuff.
Where da east road go?
Where da west road go?
Actually, I'd rather ask you about something else.
Is there a place to buy equipment nearby?
Where does the east road lead?
Where does the west road lead?
Anything interesting going on in these parts?
You know good places to go 'round here?
Text: 이 근처에 갈 만한 좋은 곳 알아?

TextEng: Me want work.
Adventures? What adventures you speak of?
Are there any places of interest around here that I should visit?
Text: 이 근처에 가볼 만한 곳 있어?

TextEng: I'd be interested in work, if you know of anything.
What sorts of adventures?
Me not like milk cows. What he want for help?
Text: 나 젖소 젖 짜기 싫어. 그 사람 뭐 도와주길 원해?

TextEng: What does he need help with? Not plowing the fields, I assume.
Text: 뭘 도와줘야 하는데? 밭 갈기는 아니겠지, 아마?

TextEng: I'm investigating some recent events you might be aware of.
Text: 네가 알 만한 최근 사건들을 조사하고 있어.

TextEng: Me have other question.
Me see cave past dem waterfalls. What be in dere?
Text: 나 폭포 지나서 동굴 봤어. 거기 뭐 있어?

TextEng: Uh... you ever been to Charwood?
Text: 어... 너 그을린숲 가본 적 있어?

TextEng: You know stuff 'bout dat plague cult in Neverwinter?
Text: 너 네버윈터 역병 사교 거 알아?

TextEng: I want to ask you something else.
I saw a cave up past those waterfalls. Do you know anything about it?
Text: 폭포 위쪽에 동굴이 보이던데. 거기에 대해 아는 거 있어?

TextEng: Wolfies? Dey be a threat to you?
Wolves? Are they a threat?
Have you ever been to Charwood?
Tell more. Me want to know more 'bout Charwood?
Text: 더 얘기해. 나 그을린숲 더 알고 싶어.

TextEng: Is there anything else you can tell me about Charwood?
Text: 그을린숲에 대해 다른 거 알려줄 수 있어?

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Insight]</Start> Do you know of anyone who might have been there?
Do you know anything about the cult that spread plague in Neverwinter?
Text: 네버윈터에 역병을 퍼뜨린 사교에 대해 아는 거 있어?

TextEng: You sure you not know more 'bout da cult?
Text: 너 그 사교 더 모르는 거 확실해?

TextEng: You're sure you don't know anything else about the cult?
Text: 그 사교에 대해 정말 다른 거 모르는 거 맞아?

TextEng: Me add fun to you life if you want.
Text: 나 네 삶에 재미 더해줄 수 있어.

TextEng: Is there anything I can do to liven up your life?
Text: 네 삶을 활기차게 만들어줄 수 있는 게 있을까?

TextEng: Me not care. Me have other question.
Text: 나 신경 안 써. 나 다른 질문 있어.

TextEng: I don't care to hear your excuses. I have another question.
Text: 변명 듣고 싶지 않아. 다른 질문 있어.

TextEng: Since Erik what?
<StartCheck>[Insight]</Start> Is there anyone who might know more?
What wrong with Erik?
What do you mean about Erik?
What you do to him?
What did you do?
Who you be?
Who are you?
Well, you be pretty, that good 'nuff for me.
Well, you are rather pretty...
Where you lead me?
What do you mean by that?
Me get what you say now. You be pretty, that good 'nuff for me.
Text: 이제 무슨 말인지 알겠어. 너 예쁘잖아, 그거면 충분해.

TextEng: Oh, that! Well, you are rather cute...
Text: 아, 그거! 뭐, 꽤 귀엽긴 한데...

TextEng: Maybe me be simple, but you got big mouth and crooked teeth!
Text: 나 단순할지 몰라도, 너 입 크고 이빨 삐뚤어졌어!

TextEng: I'm not simple, I was meerly trying to give you a chance to act more like a proper, young lady.
Text: 난 단순한 게 아니야, 그냥 제대로 된 숙녀처럼 행동할 기회를 주려고 했던 거야.

TextEng: We talk 'bout dat brooch of Erik's, 'kay?
I want to speak with you about Erik's brooch.
Slow down. Me ask 'bout something else.
Text: 천천히 해봐. 나 다른 거 물어볼 거야.

TextEng: You give it or me just kill you an' bring him your corpse, yuh?
Text: 그거 줘, 아니면 그냥 너 죽여서 시체 가져다줄 거야, 응?

TextEng: But it be all dat remind Ingo of him dead wife, yuh?
Text: 근데 그게 잉고가 죽은 부인 떠올리는 유일한 거잖아, 응?

TextEng: Slow down, I need to ask you about something else.
Text: 천 천히, 다른 거 물어봐야 해.

TextEng: How'd you like me to pry it from your cold, dead hands?
Text: 네 차가운, 죽은 손에서 빼앗는 게 어때?

TextEng: Be reasonable. Ingo treasures that brooch, because it reminds him of his wife.
Text: 합리적으로 생각해. 잉고는 그 브로치를 소중히 여겨, 부인을 떠올리게 하니까.

TextEng: Uh... tell me 'bout Erik.
All right, tell me a little about Erik.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> But he love you Constance. Be good to him.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 근데 그 사람 너 사랑해 콘스탄스. 잘해줘.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> He loves you Constance. Don't betray that.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 그 사람 널 사랑해 콘스탄스. 그 마음 배신하지 마.

TextEng: Why dis 'erd be so important?
Why is the herd so important?
Why dis 'erd be so important?
Why is the herd so important?
Money? Dat be all dis mean to you?
Text: 돈? 그게 너한테 이게 의미하는 전부야?

TextEng: Money? That's all this means to you?
Text: 돈? 그게 너한테 이게 의미하는 전부야?

TextEng: Gimme da li'l brooch an' you have my heart, li'l lady...
Text: 그 작은 브로치만 줘, 그럼 내 마음을 주지, 아가씨...

TextEng: Uh, well maybe me buy it off you, den.
Text: 어, 그럼 살 수도 있어, 그럼.

TextEng: For but a peasant's brooch, you'll have my undying love.
Text: 농부의 브로치 하나로, 내 영원한 사랑을 얻게 될 거야.

TextEng: Maybe I can buy it off you...
You give brooch or me slit stomachs, yuh?!
Text: 브로치 줘, 아니면 내가 배 가를 거야, 응?!

TextEng: Me not got that much gold for spend on this.
Text: 나 이거에 쓸 금화 그만큼 없어.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Dat too much for peasant's doodad. Me give 250.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 농부 물건에 너무 비싸. 나 250 줄게.

TextEng: Hand the brooch over or I'll gut you like a fish!
Text: 브로치 내놔 아니면 생선처럼 갈라버릴 거야!

TextEng: Me not argue no more. Now me kill you!!
Text: 나 더 안 싸워. 이제 죽여!!

TextEng: I'm done haggling. Time to kill you and take it for free!
Text: 흥정은 끝이야. 죽이고 공짜로 가져갈 시간이야!

TextEng: Me not afford that much for this.
I can't afford to spend that much on this.
250? Deal.
I can't afford to spend that much gold on this.
Text: 이거에 그만큼 금화 쓸 여유 없어.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> It's a simple peasant's brooch, worth 250 at most!
Me no got 400 gold to spend on this.
I don't have 400 gold to spend on this.
400 gold? Deal.
<StartAction>[Insight]</Start> Take the 250. The next fool Erik sends might not be so happy to negotiate.
Text: <StartAction>[통찰]</Start> 250을 받아. 에릭이 다음에 보낼 바보는 협상할 기분이 아닐지도 몰라.

TextEng: 1,000 gold? Deal.
Yuh? Me guess me go now, den.
What you mean you be robbed?
Hey - you no give item. Me want me money back!
Text: 야 - 너 물건 안 줬잖아. 나 돈 돌려받고 싶어!

TextEng: Me no believe you - you give item now!
Text: 나 안 믿어 - 너 지금 물건 내놔!

TextEng: Really? I guess I'll be going then.
What do you mean you've been robbed?
Hey - if you don't have the item, I want my money back!
I don't believe you - hand over the brooch... now!
Fine, you keep money.
You give me money back, or me kill you!
That not fair!
Fine, keep the money.
Give my money back or I'll slit your throat!
Text: 돈 돌려줘 아니면 목을 그을 거야!

TextEng: That's not fair!
Why so much money?
